On Amazon.

So far haven't used it, however, the adapters that screw into the intake manifolds are larger than the fittings on the gauges.

Universal Motorcycle Vacuum Carburetor Synchronizer Synchronization Balancer Carb Sync Balancing Gauge Compatible with Honda Yamaha Kawasaki Suzuki GS KZ XS CB 550 650 750 850 900 BMW


I added a piece of tubing to the gauges to match them.
